titleStmt.title: A treatise on the First Psalme. By Mathew Stonham. Minister and preacher in the cittie of Norwich
titleStmt.author: Stoneham, Mathew.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by G. Eld for Walter Burre,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A² B-2G⁴ 2H² .
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some pages stained and faded. Title page cropped at head.
